Articles.Content:
Several revisions of KSP ago, there was a MOD called "Scene Jumper". This MOD allowed the user to jump from the flight to any other "area" (launchpad, VAB, ...) without having to go through the spaceport first.  I cannot find this MOD so I will assume, (yes, I know), it is no longer available. Is there an alternate MOD that will provide the same function?

Thanks,

TB2
It hasn't been updated yet.

Ok thanks.  Looks like the Quick Mod is what I'm looking for.

Thanks again
